measured_by: metadata attributes PC (relation to parent), APC (relation to initial claim), and align (concordance/discordance)
justification: “We decided to designate the following attributes to each case: ... claim's relation to its parent (PC; pro/con), claim's relation to initial claim (APC; pro/con), alignment of relation to parent and initial claim (align; 'concordance' … / 'discordance' …).”

“Another code was developed to express 'distance' from the content of the initial claim; the code Relevance was expressed on a scale of 1 to 3, one being the most relevant … and 3 being the least relevant.”
“We developed codes that aimed to denote the literal content of claims (n=3) … Content codes relied on the nature of the claim's discourse.”
“We developed codes that aimed to denote … types of evidence brought to support an argument (n=3).”
